mil7.5.4:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vicchikassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.4:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, vicchiko naṅgulāvudho naṅgulaṃ ussāpetvā carati;
mil7.5.4:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇāvudhena bhavitabbaṃ, ñāṇaṃ ussāpetvā viharitabbaṃ.
mil7.5.4:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vicchikassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
